      • didDisconnectDevice

        public void didDisconnectDevice(BluetoothDevice btDevice)
        Description copied from interface: IRigLeConnectionManagerObserver
        This method is called when a device disconnects. Since the RigLeBaseDevice object is no longer valid after disconnection, this method provides the low level Bluetooth device in case is it relevant to the disconnection.
        Specified by:
        didDisconnectDevice in interface IRigLeConnectionManagerObserver
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The disconnected Bluetooth Device object
